content: I'm considering getting a dash cam for my Honda Civic. Can you tell me more about the benefits of having one, like how it can help with insurance claims in case of an accident? By the way, I recently replaced my old car's air conditioning compressor, which was a pretty pricey repair - I'm trying to be more proactive about car maintenance now. I actually just sold my old 2002 Toyota Corolla, which I had listed on Craigslist for $1,500, but it's good to focus on my current car now.
